item.description:
This month's meeting shall be about the newly released Flash Builder 4! It is a very exciting time to be working with Adobe products and this is just one of so many coming out this year.

Agenda:
6:00pm - 6:20pm Sign in, socialize, refreshments.

6:20-7:45 Demonstration: Penny shall show off some of the new and awesome features of the recently released Flash Builder 4 (formerly known as Flex Builder).

Highlights shall include:

What's new in Flash Builder 4, such as the Spark component library, 2 way binding and improved functionality, to name a few. She will also show a quick workflow from Photoshop to Catalyst to Flash Builder.

7:45-8:00pm Q&A, Prizes (including a big one, you might not want to miss) shall be given out, discussion of next meeting

8:00 + retire to our favorite watering hole
Directions:
Link to Campus Map. Webster Hall is 18. Meeting is in room 106, in the front door, take a left, on the right.
Note about the address:
If you are using a GPS, you may need to enter Hooksett instead of Manchester (it is on the line).
IMPORTANT!!! Please RSVP to either the Adobe Groups site OR the Meetup.com site if you are coming, at least 1 day in advance. Adobe has generously sponsored this meeting with refreshments and a headcount is important.
item.how_to_find_us: Room 106, Note, you may have to use Hooksett or South Hooksett if using a GPS instead of Manchester
item.name: April Meeting - A Very Special Flex Event
